additionalLossCondition.name: Land Stripped Bare
additionalLossCondition.description: At the end of the <fast> Phase, the Invaders win if any land has at least 8 total Invaders/<blight> (combined).

steps.description: At the end of the <fast> Phase, the Invaders win if any land has at least 8 total Invaders/<blight> (combined).

escalation.name: Mining Tunnels
escalation.description: {escalation}  After Advancing Invader Cards: On each board, Explore in 2 lands whose terrains don't match a Ravage or Build Card (no source required).

levels.name: Avarice Rewarded

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: In Mining lands: <disease> and modifiers to <disease> affect Ravage Actions as though they were Build Actions.

steps.name: Build
steps.description: In Mining lands: During the Build Step, Build Cards cause Ravage Actions (instead of Build Actions).

levels.staticInformation: When <blight> added by a Ravage Action would cascade, instead Upgrade 1 <explorer>/<town> (before <dahan> counterattack.). Ceaseless Mining: Lands with 3 or more Invaders are Mining lands.

levels.name: Miners Come From Far and Wide

steps.description: Setup: Add 1 <explorer> in each land with no <dahan>. Add 1 <disease> and 1 <city> in the highest-numbered land with a <town> Setup symbol.

steps.name: After Build
steps.description: After the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with <explorer>. Upgrade 1 <explorer> there.

Setup: Remove the Stage II 'Coastal Lands' card before randomly choosing Stage II cards. Place the 'Salt Deposits' card in place of the 2nd Stage II card. (New Deck Order: 111-2S22-33333, where S is the Salt Deposits card. Escalation ignores S.)

steps.name: After Build
steps.description: Instead of Mining Boom (I), after the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with <explorer>. Build there, then Upgrade 1 <explorer>. (Build normally in a Mining land.)

steps.name: Explore
steps.description: Setup and During the Explore Step: On boards with 3 or fewer <blight>: Add +1 <explorer> in each land successfully explored. (Max. 2 lands per board per Explore Card.)
